question: Can I sell a gift?
answer:
QUESTION

I would like to know if it is permissible according to the Quran and Sunnah to sell a gift. Gifts or complimentary items such as small durables and tickets as you know are received free, therefore will it be permissible for one to sell them?

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

As-salāmu ‘alaykum wa-rahmatullāhi wa-barakātuh.


It is permissible to sell something that has been given to someone as a gift because when a person is given a gift, he becomes the owner of that item[1] and when a person owns something, he can do what he wishes with it[2].

And Allah Ta’āla Knows Best





Checked and Approved by,
Mufti Husain Kadodia




[1] هي تمليك العين بلا عوض 

البحر الرائق, ج.٧, ص.٤٨٣,دار الكتب العلمية

[2] عَنْ عَلِيٍّ، أَنَّ أُكَيْدِرَ دُومَةَ أَهْدَى إِلَى النَّبِيِّ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ ثَوْبَ حَرِيرٍ، فَأَعْطَاهُ عَلِيًّا، فَقَالَ: شَقِّقْهُ خُمُرًا بَيْنَ الْفَوَاطِمِ  

مسلمم, ج.٣, ص١٦٤٥, دار احياء التراث العربي
